entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
